description: Variable-specific GSS non-substantive codes that map to NA

notes.string_patterns._all: Applied to all object/string columns unless overridden per-column
notes.numeric_codes: Only recode listed columns. Codes not in list are preserved as valid values.
notes.HEALTH: No numeric NA codes (categories are exclusive)
notes.YEAR: Must be integer; non-integer is validation error
notes.HAPPY: Must be valid category; no numeric recoding
notes.WTSSPS: Must be numeric >0; treated as missing if 0 or NA
